name: The Elemental Dice
description:
LORE

You are the elemental dice (a God in his weakened form). Reclaim the fragments of your soul to regain your true power and fight the chaos of randomness. 

GAMEPLAY
  • Water, Earth and Fire - Use on corresponding HP bars on statues.
  • Air - Increases move speed and jump height. Hold LMB to glide.
  • Crack all the gems by defeating statues, open the door and collect the gold cube to proceed.
TOOLS USED
  • Unity
  • GIMP
  • Audacity
  • LMMS
THE TEAM
  • Rilabeast: programming
  • hesamzkr: programming
  • HagridPlank: art / sound / music

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam
